post.body: As is the new keyword functionality. Title Comp - very cool, thanks guys. :-)
Wow - New Market Samurai is looking very festive! That's wicked!! :-)
Get a baby a/c with hostgator and install the blogs on sub domains. Use the same plugins as WP Direct. Short term prob solver
...and it's a brave man who buys a woman 'oven mitts'...seriously, don't ask me about that, I'm still traumatized...
Or anything to do with weightloss. We may need to shave off a few lbs but we don't wanna be reminded at XMAS...or ever actually!
Anything that involves cleaning the house in any way, shape or form! Unless it's hired help
You're welcome. My daughter absolutely loved it!
You're welcome! Just got my Santa video and it's FANTASTIC. If any of you have kids check it out http://72.55.134.30/home/
You're welcome - it wouldn't be Xmas without elfing yourself....lol
http://twitpic.com/svox - Beyond cute!! :)
...Or make sure that nothing is on fire!!!
We managed to escape all colds this Crimbo - last yr we got hit BIG time but sniffle free this year - just Wii strain ;-)
Spoke 2 some1 2day who's horrified how much of my life is run online, I'm amazed there's still people who can but don't use the Internet yet
Drinking a glass of Montana SB and wondering how I ever did Xmas without Amazon in years gone by. My life would fold without the Internet!
Using all of this yrs wishes & fairy dust on this one from @DanRaine http://www.danraine.com/xmas/day6.php
http://tinyurl.com/6rahtu Everything you should AVOID in Social Media, great mash-up of some of the best posts
Frankly I'm amazed at how far a 2yr old can spread a packet of crisps...
For anyone with children who missed this last night http://72.55.134.30/home/ it's an excellent personalized Santa vid 4 your child. Magical
I've got another 2 Santa vids to do for my other 2 girls now - it's very cool! Can't wait to see their faces tomorrow. :)
Currently Browsing: http://72.55.134.30/create-a-video/1 free personalised email video from Santa to your child - looks good!
Husband has just watched The Omen..waiting for 'weird stuff' to happen now..weird stuff always happens when The Omen is on :o
...and there was my 2 yr old daughter introducing herself to the Twittersphere...
,,cgb mvvc cxslnjkjb vtgfvstgdcr.
And yet again I box up all of the Xmas decs only to find the elusive one laffin at me in the corner....
New Year, Clean Slate, Fresh Start - Tie up loose ends before starting new projects and make it your best year yet #Happy09
I'm officially back to work tomorrow (ish), am being told to get off my laptop as it's New Yrs Day! Have a goodun' folks.
Happy New Year! I have arrived with a Wii injury - overuse of right arm on bowling - I won!! Great fun but back to work tomorrow!
Happy hols folks. Kids are tucked up waiting for Santa so time to rest now. Peace to all of Twittersville, xxx
(no prizes - weird shaped or otherwise - for guessing what I'm doing!!) Love Christmas - hate wrapping presents!
When manufacturers create products and stuff them into weird shaped boxes, do they even consider the 'mare' it is to wrap the damn things...
